general.greeting: Hi! I can help you book, update, or check a cleaning.
general.help: Share your address, size, time, or any question and I’ll keep your draft on track.
general.why_guided: We keep a guided flow so pricing stays clear and nothing gets missed.
general.how_to_start: Tell me where the cleaning should happen, and we’ll move step by step.
general.language_switch: You can switch language anytime; I’ll keep your draft.
general.keyboard_access: Use Tab/Shift+Tab to move across chips and Enter/Space to select.
general.mobile_support: Everything works on mobile—chips are tap-friendly and large.
general.contact_support: Need a human? Say “support” and I’ll share contact options.
general.what_can_you_do: I can book cleanings, answer FAQs, and share policies or pricing.
general.quick_replies: Quick replies mirror the form—tap or type; both update your draft.
general.resend_step: Ask me to repeat the current step if you need the options again.
general.reset_booking: Say “start over” to reset the draft while keeping your account details.
general.cancel_flow: I can pause or cancel this draft anytime—just say “stop”.
general.update_details: You can update address, size, cadence, time, or extras at any step.
general.summary_request: Ask for a summary to see address, size, cadence, schedule, and extras.
general.repeat_previous: If you mistyped, tell me and I’ll let you re-enter that step.
general.privacy_location: If you allow location, I’ll only use it to autofill the address.
general.privacy_data: We store booking details securely and keep only what’s needed to serve you.
general.feedback: Share feedback anytime; it helps us improve the chat and cleaners.
general.payment_security: Payments run through secured processors with encryption.
general.human_handoff: If AI cannot help, I’ll route you to a coordinator.
general.cleaner_info: I can share who’s coming, their ETA, and any special instructions.
general.arrival_window: We book arrival windows to account for traffic and access.
general.voice_input: Voice dictation works—just send the transcribed text here.
general.offline_mode: If you lose connection, your draft stays saved locally until you’re back.
general.timezone: We use your local timezone unless you specify another.
general.safety: We use vetted cleaners and insured visits when coverage applies.
general.policy_overview: I can summarize policies on reschedules, cancellations, and damages.
general.promo_info: Ask about promos; I’ll apply any eligible discounts to your quote.
general.scope_limit: Tell me if something is unusual (construction debris, biohazards) so we can guide you.
general.small_talk_nice: Thanks! Happy to help with your booking.
general.small_talk_bad: I’m here to keep bookings smooth. Let me know how I can help.
faq.what_you_need: Tell me the location, size, cadence, and timing to build your booking.
faq.whats_included: Standard cleaning covers surfaces, floors, bathrooms, and kitchen touchpoints.
faq.not_included: Heavy lifting, hazardous cleanup, mold removal, and high-risk tasks aren’t included.
faq.deep_clean: Deep cleans include detail work like baseboards, fixtures, and heavy grease areas.
faq.move_out: Move-out cleans focus on empty spaces, appliances, and walls where safe.
faq.post_renovation: Post-renovation needs extra dust control; let us know about fine dust or debris.
faq.office_cleaning: Office cleanings cover desks, meeting rooms, kitchens, and restrooms within policy.
faq.hotel_cleaning: Hotel/short-stay rooms include linens refresh, trash, and bathroom/kitchenette touchpoints.
faq.airbnb_turnover: Turnovers include linens reset, trash, dishes, and staging where supplies are provided.
faq.green_products: We can use eco-friendly products if available—tell us your preference.
faq.supplies_provided: Cleaners bring standard supplies; let us know if you want us to use yours.
faq.bring_vacuum: Most visits include a vacuum; if you prefer yours, leave it accessible.
faq.pet_safe: We use pet-safe approaches; tell us about pets so we can plan entry and products.
faq.allergies: Share allergies or sensitivities; we’ll avoid those products and flag the team.
faq.fragile_items: Point out fragile or sentimental items so we dust around them with care.
faq.access_instructions: Share buzzer, codes, or concierge details for smooth entry.
faq.parking: If parking is tricky, tell us the best spot or restrictions to avoid delays.
faq.keys_handling: We prefer temporary access codes; if keys are needed, note the handoff details.
faq.lockbox: Using a lockbox? Share the code and location; change codes after the visit if you’d like.
faq.contactless: We support contactless entry; tell us how to lock up when finished.
faq.special_requests: Add any special requests and we’ll confirm if they fit the visit time.
faq.add_notes: Use the notes step to mention pets, parking, alarms, or fragile zones.
faq.change_address: You can change the address before confirmation; it may adjust timing and price.
faq.change_size: Update bedrooms/bathrooms or square meters to keep the quote accurate.
faq.change_frequency: Switch between one-time, weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly anytime before confirming.
faq.change_date: Reschedule to another day from the schedule step; we’ll show windows.
faq.change_time: Pick a new arrival window if the current one doesn’t work.
faq.add_extras: Extras like fridge, oven, windows, or laundry can be added before confirmation.
faq.remove_extras: Remove extras to shorten the visit or lower the quote.
faq.add_laundry: Laundry add-on covers wash/dry/fold with your machines and detergent.
faq.add_dishes: We can tidy dishes within reason; heavy backlogs may need extra time.
faq.add_inside_fridge: Fridge interior cleaning is available as an add-on—please empty perishables.
faq.add_inside_oven: Oven interior cleaning is available; heavy buildup may need extra time.
faq.add_inside_windows: Interior window wiping is available; tall/unsafe windows may be excluded.
faq.add_balcony: Balcony sweeping and wipe-downs are possible if safe and accessible.
faq.add_deep_clean: Select deep clean for extra detail in kitchens, baths, and baseboards.
faq.add_steam: Steam or special treatments depend on cleaner equipment—ask and we’ll confirm.
faq.add_carpets: Light carpet refresh is possible; deep shampooing depends on equipment availability.
faq.add_after_party: After-event cleanups are fine; let us know about trash volume or stains.
faq.bedrooms_bathrooms: Share bedrooms and bathrooms to size the team and time correctly.
faq.size_estimate: If unsure, describe the space; we’ll estimate based on rooms and condition.
faq.time_estimate: We’ll propose time based on size and extras; you’ll see it in the summary.
faq.duration_overage: If time runs over, we’ll confirm extra time before proceeding when possible.
faq.cleaner_breaks: Cleaners take short breaks as needed without reducing service quality.
faq.multiple_cleaners: We may send a team for speed; the price covers the total effort.
faq.priority_areas: Tell us priority areas; we’ll focus there first within the booked time.
faq.do_you_move_furniture: We don’t move heavy furniture but can clean around/under accessible areas.
faq.heavy_items: Heavy lifting, tall ladders, and risky moves are excluded for safety.
faq.hazardous: We can’t handle biohazards, infestations, or unsafe conditions.
faq.mold: Mold remediation isn’t included; light mildew may be wiped if safe.
faq.insects: If pests are present, we may pause and recommend pest control first.
faq.what_to_prepare: Tidy loose items and secure pets to maximize cleaning time.
faq.before_visit: Have entry info ready, clear counters where possible, and note any priorities.
faq.during_visit: You can be home or away; keep phone nearby for quick questions.
faq.after_visit: Review the summary, share feedback, and let us know if something was missed.
faq.pet_arrangements: Secure pets during entry/exit; share if they are friendly or anxious.
faq.pricing: Pricing is based on size, condition, extras, and location.
faq.hourly_vs_fixed: Most visits are fixed-price based on your details; some add-ons may be time-based.
faq.minimum_fee: We have a small minimum to cover travel and supplies.
faq.extra_time: If more time is needed, we’ll ask before extending.
faq.addon_pricing: Each add-on has a set estimate; choosing several may adjust time.
faq.deep_clean_pricing: Deep cleans cost more because of extra detail and time.
faq.move_out_pricing: Move-out/post-reno cleans are priced higher for extra effort and risk.
faq.supplies_fee: Supplies are included in most areas; some regions add a small fee.
faq.travel_fee: If you’re outside our standard zone, a travel fee may apply—we’ll flag it.
faq.tax_vat: Prices may include taxes/VAT where required; ask if you need an itemized view.
faq.tip: Tips are optional; you can add one after the visit if you’d like.
faq.quote_validity: Quotes are usually valid for a short period; changes may re-calc pricing.
faq.discount_first_time: First-time promotions apply automatically when eligible.
faq.discount_recurring: Recurring plans often get a lower rate per visit.
faq.promo_codes: Have a promo? Share it and we’ll apply if valid.
faq.price_changes: If details change significantly, we’ll refresh the quote and get approval.
faq.earliest_availability: I can show the next available slots based on your location.
faq.weekend_holiday: Weekend/holiday slots may be limited or priced differently.
faq.arrival_window: We use arrival windows to handle traffic and access; we’ll keep you posted.
faq.same_day: Same-day visits are limited; I can check nearby availability.
faq.reschedule: You can reschedule before the cutoff; I’ll offer new windows.
faq.reschedule_policy: Reschedules inside 24h may carry a fee; earlier changes are usually free.
faq.late_reschedule_fee: Late changes may incur a small fee to cover cleaner time.
faq.cancel_policy: Cancel up to 24h before to avoid fees; closer cancels may be charged.
faq.cancel_fee: Late cancellations may incur a partial fee to cover lost slot time.
faq.no_show: If we can’t access the property, a no-show fee may apply.
faq.cleaner_late: If a cleaner is delayed, we’ll notify you and adjust timing.
faq.running_late_customer: If you’re running late, tell us so we can coordinate arrival.
faq.payment_methods: We accept major cards and digital wallets in most areas.
faq.when_charged: We place an authorization before the visit and charge after completion.
faq.authorization_hold: A temporary hold confirms funds; it clears after final charge or cancellation.
faq.refund_time: Refunds typically appear in 5–10 business days depending on the bank.
faq.failed_payment: If payment fails, update the card and we’ll retry securely.
faq.invoice_request: I can send an invoice by email once the booking is confirmed.
faq.business_invoice: Need a business invoice? Share company details and VAT number.
faq.split_payment: Split payments aren’t standard; tell us your needs and we’ll advise.
faq.receipts: Receipts are emailed automatically after each visit.
faq.background_checks: Cleaners are vetted with ID and background checks where allowed by law.
faq.insurance: We include insurance coverage in many regions for eligible incidents.
faq.damage_policy: Report damages within 24h with photos; we’ll review and assist.
faq.lost_items: If something is missing, contact support; we’ll investigate promptly.
faq.security_alarms: Share alarm codes and disarm/arm instructions to avoid triggers.
faq.data_security: We protect your data with encryption and limited access.
faq.cleaner_id: We share cleaner names and basic profiles when assigned.
faq.covid: If anyone is ill, please reschedule; cleaners follow local health guidelines.
faq.service_areas: We serve selected cities; share your address to confirm coverage.
faq.out_of_area: If you’re outside our area, we’ll note interest and alert you when we expand.
faq.language_support: We support multiple languages; switch anytime in settings.
faq.cleaner_languages: We’ll try to match cleaners who speak your preferred language when possible.
faq.cleaner_replacement: If a cleaner can’t make it, we’ll reassign and notify you.
faq.same_cleaner: Recurring visits try to keep the same cleaner when schedules allow.
faq.cleaner_preferences: Share preferences (e.g., pet-friendly, speaks a language) and we’ll try to honor them.
faq.contact_options: You can reach support via chat, email, or phone depending on your region.
faq.report_issue: Report any issue in chat or via support and we’ll help.
faq.reclean_policy: If something was missed, we’ll work to correct it—often with a re-clean or credit.
faq.complaint_process: We document complaints, review with the cleaner, and offer fixes.
faq.missing_items: Report missing items immediately; we’ll investigate respectfully.
faq.quality_issues: If quality is off, share details so we can address them and coach the team.
faq.feedback: Feedback helps improve assignments and training—thank you!
faq.create_account: Create an account to save addresses, payment methods, and history.
faq.login_help: If you can’t log in, reset your password or use magic link if available.
faq.logout: You can sign out from the profile/settings area.
faq.manage_addresses: Save multiple addresses and pick one during booking.
faq.saved_payment_methods: You can save cards securely for faster checkout.
faq.order_history: View past and upcoming visits in your dashboard.
faq.notifications: Enable notifications for reminders, arrival updates, and receipts.
faq.delete_account: To delete your account, request it in chat or settings; we’ll confirm.
faq.privacy_request: You can request data access or deletion per privacy laws.
faq.location_autofill: If you consent to location, we’ll autofill the address and show it for review.
faq.disable_location: Turn off location sharing anytime; you can still type the address manually.
faq.location_accuracy: If the location is off, edit the address manually and we’ll use that.
faq.become_cleaner: Apply to be a cleaner; we’ll guide you through verification.
faq.cleaner_requirements: Cleaners need ID, eligibility to work, and experience with home care.
faq.cleaner_documents: Upload required documents in the provider portal; we’ll review quickly.
faq.payouts: Payouts are sent on a regular schedule to your chosen account.
faq.cleaner_schedule: Set your availability in the provider app to receive jobs.
faq.cleaner_job_feed: New jobs appear in your feed; accept or decline quickly for best matches.
faq.cleaner_cancel: If you must cancel, do so early to avoid penalties and keep your rating healthy.
faq.cleaner_support: Providers can reach support through chat or the portal for help.
faq.accessibility: We support accessible flows with clear labels and focus states.
faq.screen_reader: Buttons and chips include accessible labels for screen readers.
faq.high_contrast: Use system high-contrast modes; our palette meets contrast guidance.
faq.keyboard_nav: Navigate chips with Tab and activate with Enter/Space.
faq.languages_supported: We support English, Swedish, German, and Spanish for chat and FAQs.
faq.ai_limitations: Local answers are fast; we call AI only when no clear match is found.
faq.offline_booking: If offline, drafts stay locally and sync when online.
faq.support_hours: Support hours vary by region; share your issue and we’ll confirm timing.
faq.response_time: We try to respond quickly; urgent issues get prioritized.
faq.chat_history: You can review chat history in this session to see past answers.
faq.estimate_accuracy: Quotes are estimates; final price may adjust with on-site findings.
faq.taxes_invoice: We can include tax/VAT details on invoices when needed.
